div.ab: "To . . . , basilikogrammateus and deputy-strategos, from Ptolemaios, son of . . ., and Serenus, son of Ischyrion, grandson of Apollonios, and . . . , all of the city of the Oxyrhynchi. Of the communication which I obtained from the bureau a copy follows. Potamon alias Didymos, priest and archidikastes, to the strategos of the Oxyrhynchite nome, greeting. Let a copy of the petition which has been presented be served, as below. Farewell. Year . . . of Aurelius Commodus Antoninus Caesar the lord, (month, day). I, . . ., have signed. I, Hephaestion alias Sarapion, did the writing. To Potamon alias Didymos, priest, archidikastes, and superintendent of the chrematistae and other courts, from Ptolemaios, son of . . ., and Serenos, son of Ischyrion, grandson of Apollonios, and . . ."
